attributes.name: versionSupport
attributes.description: Provides a list of all the BLE versions supported by the device. For example, [4.1, 4.2, 5.0, 5.1, 5.2, 5.3].

attributes.name: deviceMacAddress
attributes.description: It is the public MAC address assigned by the manufacturer. It is unique 48 bit value. The regex pattern is ^[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}(:[0-9A-Fa-f]{2}){5}.

attributes.name: addressType
attributes.description: AddressType flag is taken from the BLE core specifications 5.3. If FALSE, the device is using public MAC address. If TRUE, device is using Random address which is resolved using IRK.

attributes.name: irk
attributes.description: Identity resolving key, which is unique for every device. It is used to resolve random address.

attributes.name: pairingMethods
attributes.description: List of pairing methods associated with the ble device, stored as schema URI.

name: nullPairing
description: Null pairing method for ble. It is included for the devices that do not have a pairing method.

name: pairingJustWorks
description: Just works pairing method for ble.

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: Just works does not have any key value. For completeness, it is added with a key value 'null'.

name: pairingPassKey
description: Pass key pairing method for ble.

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: A six digit passkey for ble device. The pattern of key is ^[0-9]{6}$.

name: pairingOOB
description: Pass key pairing method for ble.

attributes.name: key
attributes.description: A key value retrieved from out of band source such as NFC.

attributes.name: confirmationNumber
attributes.description: Some solutions require confirmation number in RESTful message exchange.
